question: Hi All,It has been suggested to me a couple of times that M.S. is service related. I never really paid any attention to it as I know that the cause for M.S. is unkown, and generally service-connected disabilities have a known or suspected cause.Well, I found out today through my regional V.A. office that M.S. is considered service related when a diagnosis is made within 7 years of discharge and there is at least 10% disability.Hopefully this will help somebody...Disability check, here I come!Here's a post on another site that I found via google for anybody who is interested. This is where I started my research, and like I said, ended at my regional VA office. http://www.chemtrailcentral.com/ubb/Forum3/HTML/000043.htmlKenny
title: M.S. is service related!
